message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $170?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm really interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $120.
